verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with his <S%H7186>hard<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> the <S%H1281>swift<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, and <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> the <S%H6129>crooked<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; and he will <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H8577>monster<s%> that is in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%>: A <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H2561>wine<s%>, sing ye unto <S%H6031>it<s%>.

I <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> am its <S%H5341>keeper<s%>; I will <S%H8248>water<s%> it every <S%H7281>moment<s%>: lest any <S%H6485>hurt<s%> <S%H5341>it<s%>, I will keep it <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Wrath <S%H2534><s%> is not in <S%H5414>me<s%>: would that the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%> were against me in <S%H4421>battle<s%>! I would <S%H6585>march<s%> upon <S%H6702>them<s%>, I would burn them <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Or else let him take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength<s%>, that he may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>me<s%>; yea, let him make peace with <S%H7965>me<s%>.

In days to <S%H935>come<s%> shall <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> take <S%H8327>root<s%>; <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6692>blossom<s%> and <S%H6524>bud<s%>; and they shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H8570>fruit<s%>.

Hath he <S%H5221>smitten<s%> them as he <S%H4347>smote<s%> those that <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H2026>them<s%>? or are they slain according to the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> of them that were slain by <S%H2026>them<s%>?

In <S%H5432>measure<s%>, when thou <S%H7971>sendest<s%> them <S%H7378>away<s%>, thou dost contend with <S%H1898>them<s%>; he hath removed them with his <S%H7186>rough<s%> <S%H7307>blast<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>.

Therefore by <S%H2063>this<s%> shall the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> be <S%H3722>forgiven<s%>, and this is all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of taking <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%>: that he <S%H7760>maketh<s%> all the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as <S%H1615>chalkstones<s%> that are beaten in <S%H5310>sunder<s%>, so that the <S%H842>Asherim<s%> and the <S%H2553>sun-images<s%> shall rise no <S%H6965>more<s%>.

For the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H910>solitary<s%>, a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H5800>deserted<s%> and <S%H7971>forsaken<s%>, like the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: there shall the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%>, and there shall he lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and <S%H3615>consume<s%> the branches <S%H5585>thereof<s%>.

When the <S%H7105>boughs<s%> thereof are <S%H3001>withered<s%>, they shall be broken <S%H7665>off<s%>; the <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and set them on <S%H215>fire<s%>; for it is a <S%H5971>people<s%> of no <S%H998>understanding<s%>: therefore he that <S%H6213>made<s%> them will not have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon <S%H3335>them<s%>, and he that formed them will show them no <S%H2603>favor<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will beat <S%H2251>off<s%> his fruit from the <S%H7641>flood<s%> of the <S%H5104>River<s%> unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one<s%>, O ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> shall be <S%H8628>blown<s%>; and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> that were ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and they that were <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and they shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
